item.title: Naruto comes to an end
item.author: hello@forevergenin.com (SPK)
item.description: Finally, after much deliberation I have decided to spend some time on maintaining a personal blog (more about this decision later). Now the question is what should be my first post? Much like most of the decisions I have made in my life I left this one as well to randomness and I stumbled upon this article at Kotaku. Though it was my first manga, the truth is I was not worried much about the end.
